definition: black-boned chicken/silky fowl/silkie/Gallus gallus domesticus Brisson
abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu

sentences.english: We are specialized in silky fowl and food products.
sentences.chinese: 我们专门出产真空包装乌骨鸡和一般食品。

sentences.english: So, it suggested that the mule chickens were the progeny of Guinea fowl and the black normal feather Wugu chicken.
sentences.chinese: 因此，本结果支持骡鸡是乌骨鸡和珍珠鸡的杂交后代。

sentences.english: Silkies have unique medicinal tonic function and the role of diet.
sentences.chinese: 乌骨鸡有独特的药用功能和滋补食疗作用。

sentences.english: The study on the digestive rates of dietary amino acids in silky fowl;
sentences.chinese: 研究了日粮中添加花粉对黑羽乌骨鸡生长发育的影响。

sentences.english: Some are very fast and aggressive, others are quite smooth and silky.
sentences.chinese: 有些是非常快和侵略性，其他相当顺利和乌骨鸡。

sentences.english: The effect of supplement pollen in diet on growth and development of Black-bone chicken with black feather was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了日粮中添加花粉对黑羽乌骨鸡生长发育的影响。

sentences.english: The property of egg - laying chicken was also studied.
sentences.chinese: 同时考查了高碘蛋生产阶段乌骨鸡的生产性能。

sentences.english: Primers are light weight gentle creams that make the skin smooth and silky.
sentences.chinese: 引物是重量轻，温柔面霜，使皮肤光滑和乌骨鸡。

sentences.english: Results showed that Taihe silky fowl embryo could delay the swimming time, increase of serum LDH activ.
sentences.chinese: 研究泰和乌骨鸡鸡胚对小鼠抗疲劳作用。

sentences.english: Oh, it's called silky fowl soup.

definition: black-boned chicken/silky fowl/silkie/Gallus gallus domesticus Brisson
black-boned chicken/silky fowl/silkie/Gallus gallus domesticus Brisson/see also 烏骨雞|乌骨鸡[wu1 gu3 ji1]
a variety of free-range chicken, small with furless legs, laying smaller eggs
huangqi/milk vetch root (used in TCM)/Astragalus membranaceus or Astragalus mongholicus
